## Creating a ggplot

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
data(mpg)
df <- mpg
ggplot(data = df, mapping = aes(x = displ ,y =hwy)) +geom_point()

```

## Aesthetic mapping
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = df, mapping = aes(x = displ ,y =hwy, colour = class)) +geom_point()

```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = df, mapping = aes(x = displ ,y =hwy, shape = class)) +geom_point()

```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = df, mapping = aes(x = displ ,y =hwy, colour =   class)) +geom_point() +facet_wrap(~class , nrow = 2)

```


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = df, mapping = aes(x = displ ,y =hwy, colour =   class)) +geom_point() +
  facet_grid(drv ~ cyl)

```
